pros: Most caring coworkers and most compassionate mission
cons: A non profit so the pay is not good
Rapid growth, constantly changing environment and expectations without consistent reliable support

pros: Very supportive environment, patient-centered, compassionate care
cons: None that I can think of!

review_title: Collaborative, Compassionate Workplace with Dedicated Team and Solid Leadership
pros:
-collaborative work environment (CEO's door is always open)
-managers who value your feedback 
-compassionate team members 
-opportunities for growth/advancement  
-on-site training/learning opportunities
-mission driven/patient centered care 
-feeling a part of the community
-opportunities to get involved  
-competitive salary & comprehensive benefits package 
-generous leave package 
-easy commute 
-monthly staff pizza parties :)
cons: I have been with Good Shepherd Community Care for 7 years. In my experience, the days can be fast paced, however the work is meaningful and fulfilling.
